title: Yeenoghu's Gift
content:
Yeenoghu's Gift Effect Dealing damage with this weapon heals the wielder for 1d6hit points and instills them with an insatiable hunger - they can go Mad if they do not deal damage each turn. Equipment Shattered Flail

Dealing damage with this weapon heals the wielder for 1d6hit points and instills them with an insatiable hunger - they can go Mad if they do not deal damage each turn.

Yeenoghu's Gift is an Equipment Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Equipment Features provide passive effects or new con
